metadata.Title: CVE-2023-23919 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: A cryptographic vulnerability exists in Node.js <19.2.0, <18.14.1,<16.19.1, <14.21.3 that in some cases did does not clear the OpenSSL errorstack after operations that may set it. This may lead to false positiveerrors during subsequent cryptographic operations that happen to be on thesame thread. This in turn could be used to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
